definition: reckless or malicious behavior that causes discomfort or annoyance in others
details:
noun
- reckless or malicious behavior that causes discomfort or annoyance in others
= synonyms: mischief-making, mischievousness, deviltry, devilry, devilment, rascality, roguery, roguishness, shenanigan
- the quality or nature of being harmful or evil
= synonyms: maleficence, balefulness
